name: worm-whats-new
description: This is the source for producing the external links in the [What Happened This Week in Worm Fanfic](https://forums.sufficientvelocity.com/threads/wormverse-ideas-recs-and-fic-discussion-thread-1.190/page-2760#post-8554383) that I've been putting together.

scripts.build: node last-week.js & node last-week-atom.js & node last-week-md.js & node last-week-bbcode.js
scripts.build-next: node this-week.js & node this-week-atom.js & node this-week-md.js & node this-week-bbcode.js
